FuncDef: This command sets the time, in seconds, SPB wants the LSPs it originates to be considered valid by other routers in the domain. This is a control B-VPLS command.

ParaDef.Info: The time, in seconds, that SPB wants the LSPs it originates to be considered valid by other routers in the domain. Values-350 to 65535.

ExtraInfo: Default: lsp-lifetime 1200 - LSPs originated by SPB should be valid for 1200 seconds (20 minutes).
